name: ensalud-presupuestal
description: ENSALUD Presupuestal - Electron + React + Vite + Node.js

scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 vite --config vite.renderer.config.ts & cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 tsx src/main/index.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:main
